Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #63/63rd Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Kedzie
ShortDescription: Westbound 63/63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th, Pulaski and 63rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63/63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th, Pulaski and 63rd due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between O'Hare and Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem on a train near Cumberland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem on a train near Cumberland.

As a result, trains are operating only between Forest Park and Jefferson Park at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between O'Hare and Jefferson Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
